class.name: Node2D
class.brief_description: A 2D game object, parent of all 2D related nodes. Has a position, rotation, scale and Z-index.
class.description: A 2D game object, with a position, rotation and scale. All 2D physics nodes and sprites inherit from Node2D. Use Node2D as a parent node to move, scale and rotate children in a 2D project. Also gives control on the node's render order.

method.name: apply_scale
method.description: Multiplies the current scale by the 'ratio' vector.

method.name: edit_set_pivot
method.description: Set the pivot position of the 2D node to 'pivot' value. Only some Node2Ds implement this method.

method.name: get_angle_to
method.description: Returns the angle between the node and the 'point' in radians.

method.name: get_global_position
method.description: Returns the node's global position.

method.name: get_global_rotation
method.description: Returns the node's global rotation in radians.

method.name: get_global_rotation_in_degrees
method.description: Return the node's global rotation in degrees.

method.name: get_global_scale
method.description: Returns the node's global scale.

method.name: get_position
method.description: Returns the node's position.

method.name: get_relative_transform_to_parent
method.description: Returns the [Transform2D] relative to this node's parent.

method.name: get_rotation
method.description: Returns the node's rotation in radians.

method.name: get_rotation_in_degrees
method.description: Returns the node's rotation in degrees.

method.name: get_scale
method.description: Returns the node's scale.

method.name: get_z
method.description: Returns the node's Z-index.

method.name: global_translate
method.description: Adds the 'offset' vector to the node's global position.

method.name: is_z_relative
method.description: Returns true if this node's Z-index is relative to its parent's. Else, returns false.

method.name: look_at
method.description: Rotates the node so it points towards the 'point'.

method.name: move_local_x
method.description: Apply a local translation on the node's X axis based on the process's 'delta'. If 'scaled' is false, normalizes the movement.

method.name: move_local_y
method.description: Apply a local translation on the node's Y axis based on the process's 'delta'. If 'scaled' is false, normalizes the movement.

method.name: rotate
method.description: Apply a rotation to the node, in radians, starting from its current rotation.

method.name: set_global_position
method.description: Set the node's global position.

method.name: set_global_rotation
method.description: Set the node's global rotation in radians.

method.name: set_global_rotation_in_degrees
method.description: Set the node's global rotation in degrees.

method.name: set_global_scale
method.description: Set the node's global scale.

method.name: set_global_transform
method.description: Set the node's global [Transform2D].

method.name: set_position
method.description: Set the node's position.

method.name: set_rotation
method.description: Set the node's rotation in radians.

method.name: set_rotation_in_degrees
method.description: Set the node's rotation in degrees.

method.name: set_scale
method.description: Set the node's scale.

method.name: set_transform
method.description: Set the node's local [Transform2D].

method.name: set_z
method.description: Set the node's Z-index.

method.name: set_z_as_relative
method.description: Make the node's Z-index relative to its parent's Z-index. If this node's Z-index is 2 and its parent's effective Z-index is 3, then this node's effective Z-index will be 2 + 3 = 5.

method.name: translate
method.description: Translate the node locally by the 'offset' vector, starting from its current local position.

members.member: Position, relative to the node's parent.
Z-index. Controls the order in which the nodes render. A node with a higher Z-index will display in front of others.
Make the node's Z-index relative to its parent's Z-index. If this node's Z-index is 2 and its parent's effective Z-index is 3, then this node's effective Z-index will be 2 + 3 = 5.
